testcase.classname: Ready To Work: Manage Profile Feature
testcase.name: Test Ready To Work: Edit or Manage Profile - Example #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given browser is launched...................................................passed And ready to work "https://readytowork.absa.africa/login" page is open......passed Then verify login page is open..............................................passed When user enters sphelelez101@gmail.com and Nok2lasphe......................passed And user click on sign in button............................................passed Then user logged in successfully............................................passed And user click on manage profile button.....................................passed Then verify Manage Profile page is open.....................................passed When enters Personal Details Thabo and Mbhele follow by 0831234567 also unemployed.passed And user enter Address Details Florida after Gauteng last South Africa......passed And user click on Submit form...............................................passed Then verify if profile details successfully updated.........................passed And user click on logout button.............................................passed And close the browser.......................................................passed

testcase.name: ReadyToWork home page launching
testcase.system-out: Given browser is launched...................................................passed And ready to work "https://readytowork.absa.africa/" page is open...........passed Then Ready to Work e-learning platform is displayed.........................passed And close the browser.......................................................passed

testcase.name: Test Ready To Work: Forgot Password with valid email or account
